Description: St Antony; the saint stands in the centre with a staff in his right hand, behind him to the right stands a pig, to the left kneels a man raising one hand, in the upper left corner God appears from a cloud, in the right corner a scroll is placed with the name "S. ANTONI..." and to this two feet and hands are suspended Woodcut with hand-colouring
Bibliographic references: Schreiber 1926-1930 / Handbuch der Holz- und Metalschnitte des XV Jahrhunderts (1227)
Dodgson 1903, 1911 / Catalogue of Early German and Flemish Woodcuts in the BM, 2 vols (A.67)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
